snippet: Oklahoma State and Travis Ford have agreed to end his tenure as the coach of the university’s men’s team.
abstract: Oklahoma State men's basketball coach Travis Ford agrees to leave university; had 155-111 record over eight years.
lead_paragraph: Oklahoma State and Travis Ford have agreed to end his tenure as the coach of the university’s men’s team.

headline.main: Travis Ford Is Out at Oklahoma State
headline.print_headline: Ford Is Out at Oklahoma State
